snippet: Mexico's upper house on Wednesday pushed back discussions on the final touches to the country's landmark energy reform, which seeks to lure new investment into the sector and boost growth in Latin America's second-largest economy....

headline.print_headline: Mexico Senate Pushes Back Talks on Key Energy Reform Legislation
headline.main: Mexico Senate Pushes Back Talks on Key Energy Reform Legislation

lead_paragraph: Mexico's upper house on Wednesday pushed back discussions on the final touches to the country's landmark energy reform, which seeks to lure new investment into the sector and boost growth in Latin America's second-largest economy.
